results.title: A resolution designating March 25, 2017, as "National Cerebral Palsy Awareness Day".
results.short_title: A resolution designating March 25, 2017, as "National Cerebral Palsy Awareness Day".
results.latest_major_action: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S1979-1980; text as passed Senate: CR S1979)
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates March 25, 2017, as National Cerebral Palsy Awareness Day.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates March 25, 2017, as National Cerebral Palsy Awareness Day.

actions.description: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S1979-1980; text as passed Senate: CR S1979)
